plot: Passion and ambition interplay to bring dissention and tragedy into the home of an old fisherman married to a much younger woman.
title: Quando o Mar Galgou a Terra
plot_es: Passion and ambition interplay to bring dissention and tragedy into the home of an old fisherman married to a much younger woman.
original_name: Quando o Mar Galgou a Terra
plot_en: Passion and ambition interplay to bring dissention and tragedy into the home of an old fisherman married to a much younger woman.
